meta.name: nmap
meta.description: Scan for open ports using nmap

tests.name: security.nmap.ports
tests.description: Run an nmap scan of open ports

20.description: File Transfer Protocol (FTP) Server Data Transfer

21.description: File Transfer Protocol (FTP) Server Data Transfer

security.services.ftp.description: Check FTP port 20/21 is disabled and FTP is not running on any port
security.services.ftp.expected_behavior: There is no FTP service running on any port

security.services.ssh.description: Check TELNET port 23 is disabled and TELNET is not running on any port
security.services.ssh.expected_behavior: There is no FTP service running on any port

security.services.telnet.description: Check TELNET port 23 is disabled and TELNET is not running on any port
security.services.telnet.expected_behavior: There is no FTP service running on any port

465.description: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol over SSL (SMTPS) Server

587.description: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol via TLS (SMTPS) Server

security.services.smtp.description: Check SMTP port 25 is disabled and ports 465 or 587 with SSL encryption are (not?) enabled and SMTP is not running on any port.
security.services.smtp.expected_behavior: There is no smtp service running on any port

security.services.http.description: Check that there is no HTTP server running on any port
security.services.http.expected_behavior: Device is unreachable on port 80 (or any other port) and only responds to HTTPS requests on port 443 (or any other port if HTTP is used at all)

security.services.pop.description: Check POP port 110 is disalbed and POP is not running on any port
security.services.pop.expected_behavior: There is no pop service running on any port

security.services.imap.description: Check IMAP port 143 is disabled and IMAP is not running on any port
security.services.imap.expected_behavior: There is no imap service running on any port

security.services.snmpv3.description: Check SNMP port 161/162 is disabled.  If SNMP is an essential service, check it supports version 3
security.services.snmpv3.expected_behavior: Device is unreachable on port 161 (or any other port) and device is unreachable on port 162 (or any other port) unless SNMP is essential in which case it is SNMPv3 is used.

security.services.https.description: Check that if there is a web server running it is running on a secure port.
security.services.https.expected_behavior: Device only responds to HTTPS requests on port 443 (or any other port if HTTP is used at all)

5800.description: Virtual Network Computing (VNC) Remote Frame Buffer Protocol Over HTTP

5500.description: Virtual Network Computing (VNC) Remote Frame Buffer Protocol

security.services.vnc.description: Check VNC is disabled on any port
security.services.vnc.expected_behavior: Device cannot be accessed /connected to via VNc on any port

security.services.tftp.expected_behavior: There is no tftp service running on any port

security.services.ntp.description: Check NTP port 123 is disabled and the device is not operating as an NTP server
security.services.ntp.expected_behavior: The device dos not respond to NTP requests when it's IP is set as the NTP server on another device
